I am an VVA (Vidyalankar Voice Assistant) designed to assist you with various tasks and answer your questions. I am trained to understand and respond to natural language commands, allowing me to help you with tasks such as providing information, or even engaging in casual conversation. I'm here to make your life easier. Feel free to ask me anything!
By vinay and sanket
Vinay and Sanket are project partners who designed this project called Vidyalankar Voice assistant. They both are pursuing master's in information technology

Beena kapadia is a highly qualified and dedicated.She is currently pursuing a PhD and holds degrees such as an MCA from MS University Baroda 1994,a PGDCA from MS University Baroda 1990,and a BSc in PCM from MS University Baroda 1988.With 20 years of teaching experience,3 years of industrial experience,and 6 years of administrative and managerial experience,she brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the classroom.Additionally,she has published 19 technical papers,authored 6 books,and serves as the coordinator of the MScIT program. Her impressive qualifications,experience,and dedication make her an exceptional educator.

Vidyalankar School of Information Technology
Vidyalankar College Rd, Wadala East, Deen Bandhu Nagar, Antop Hill, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400037
BSc in Information Technology | BSc in Data Science | BMS | BAF | BBI | BFM | BMM | MScIT | MCom Banking and Finance | MCom(Management) | MA(Entertainment,Media & Adevertising) | PhD

Top notch Computer Lab and classroom with AC, Sports facilities, including playgrounds and indoor sports, Cafeteria serving a variety of meals, CCD, Wi-Fi connectivity across the campus, Industry collaborations, Workshops and seminars are conducted and many more cool facilities are provided

patterns: What is the expertise of the professors?
responses: Our faculty members are highly qualified and experienced experts in their respective fields. They bring a wealth of knowledge and real-world experience to the classroom, ensuring a quality learning experience for our students.

patterns: What is the college campus like?
responses: Our college campus is a vibrant and welcoming place. It spans across beautiful green landscapes, offering a serene and conducive environment for learning. With modern infrastructure and student-friendly spaces, our campus provides a comfortable and inspiring atmosphere.

Vidyalankar School of Information Technology is amongst the most popular colleges of the city offering undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral programmes in IT, Commerce, Management and Mass Media. Vidyalankar School of Information Technology is a college affiliated to the University of Mumbai and approved by the Government of Maharashtra

patterns: What support services are available for students?
How does the college support students?
responses: We prioritize the well-being and success of our students. We offer various support services,including academic counseling,career guidance, mentoring programs, and a dedicated student support center to assist with any challenges or concerns students may have.
We have several upcoming events such as campus tours, guest lectures, and career fairs. You can check our events on our website www.vsit.edu.in/eventsfinal for more details

patterns: What are the eligibility criteria for admission
responses: A pass in Class 12 with Mathematics and Statistics with a minimum of 45% to be eligible for admission in vidyalankar college

To apply, you can visit our website www.vsit.edu.in and fill out the online application form. The admission requirements include submitting your academic transcripts, standardized test scores, and a personal statement. You can find detailed information on our website or contact 2224104244 .
Students placed in top most companies are accenture, capgemini, LTI, TCS, Deloitte, kotak and many more
The college's library is equipped with a vast collection of books, journals, e-books, and online resources students have access
